segments.text: I see the cookie jar is almost empty now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is grabbing as many as he can, and the girl is just waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they’ve done this before—they seem way too comfortable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying that plate, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and she’s not doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll notice before the whole kitchen is flooded.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a mess, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR
